upper point of the head the distance between the eyes 4-5 single_crochet to stuff a toy with the fiber filler double up the front and back part of the toy crochet in the middle 2-3 single_crochet carefully count the stitches to form two identical holes for the legs at 14 single_crochet see the picture below 5 legs 2 details crochet legs completely with body r 1-5 14 single_crochet r 6 decrease *7 7 fill the leg with a fiber filler to draw the thread through 7 loops and tighten cut and secure the thread also crochet the second leg the body is ready arms 2 details r 1 magic_ring 6 r 2 2 increase *5 10 r 3 1sc increase *5 15 r 4 2sc increase *5 20 double up crochet 8-9 stitches cut and secure the thread tail r 1 magic_ring 6 r 2 5sc increase 7 r 3-20 7sc 18 rounds cut and secure the thread sew arms ears and tail as shown in the photo below make sure all parts are symmetrical to each other 6 with black threads to embroider the nose mustache eyebrows and mouth your new cat is ready 7 shirt for the cat knitting pattern using the yarn b and 3 5 mm needles cast on 52 sts 50 sts + 2 edge sts edge loops the first loop is slip the last loop is purl row 1-5 knit row 6 k8 yokyo k7 yokyo
